rukus.text: Yara kaphera taderake uccahsbare bala habe, tomadera nijedera prati tomadera ajakera e ksobha apeksa allara ksobha adhika chila, yakhana tomaderake imana anate bala hayechila, atahpara tomara kuphari karachila.
Tara balabe he amadera palanakarta! Apani amaderake duâ€™bara mrtyu diyechena ebam duâ€™ bara jibana diyechena. Ekhana amadera aparadha sbikara karachi. Atahpara ekhana o niskrtira kona upaya ache ki

tomadera e bipada e karane ye, yakhana eka allahake daka hata, takhana tomara kaphera haye yete yakhana tara sathe sarikake daka hata takhana tomara bisbasa sthapana karate. Ekhana adesa ta'i, ya allaha karabena, yini sarbocca, mahana.
Tini'i tomaderake tamra nidarsanabali dekhana ebam tomadera jan'ye akasa theke nayila karena ruyi. Cinta-bhabana tara'i kare, yara allahara dike ruju thake.
Ata'eba, tomara allahake khamti bisbasa sahakare daka, yadi'o kapherara ta apachanda kare.
Tini'i su'ucca maryadara adhikari, arasera malika, tamra bandadera madhye yara prati iccha tattbapurna bisayadi nayila karena, yate se saksatera dina samparke sakalake satarka kare.
Yedina tara bera haye parabe, allahara kache tadera kichu'i gopana thakabe na. Aja rajatba kara? Eka prabala parakranta allahara.
Aja pratyeke'i tara krtakarmera pratidana pabe. Aja yuluma ne'i. Niscaya allaha druta hisaba grahanakari.

Apani taderake asanna dina samparke satarka karuna, yakhana prana kanthagata habe, dama bandha ha'oyara upakrama habe. Papisthadera jan'ye kona bandhu ne'i ebam suparisakari'o ne'i; yara suparisa grahya habe.
Cokhera curi ebam antarera gopana bisaya tini janena.
Allaha phayasala karena sathikabhabe, allahara paribarte tara yaderake dake, tara kichu'i phayasala kare na. Niscaya allaha sabakichu sunena, sabakichu dekhena.
